alert.note: Alert for Cave Creek, New River; Deer Valley; East Valley; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Mazatzal Mountains; New River Mesa; North Phoenix, Glendale; Rio Verde, Salt River; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 01 at 8:36PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 915 PM MST... At 836 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Salt River Indian Community, or near Paradise Valley, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Scottsdale, Fountain Hills, Paradise Valley, Sugarloaf Mountain, Downtown Scottsdale, McDowell Mountain Park, Salt River Indian Community, Goldfield Ranch, Scottsdale Airport, Camelback Mountain, Rio Verde and Fort McDowell. This includes the following highways... AZ Route 87 between mile markers 176 and 194, and between mile markers 197 and 209. AZ Route 202 between mile markers 13 and 16, and near mile marker 18. AZ Route 101 between mile markers 34 and 49. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cave Creek, New River; Deer Valley; East Valley; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Mazatzal Mountains; New River Mesa; North Phoenix, Glendale; Rio Verde, Salt River; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley
